abstract: Cyril Almeida, journalist for Pakistan's leading daily newspaper Dawn, says he has been barred from leaving country; move comes days after he reported civilian officials had confronted military over failure to act against Islamist groups.
lead_paragraph: The journalist said he had been placed on an “exit control list” days after reporting a confrontation over the military’s handling of Islamist groups.

headline.main: Reporter Who Wrote of Military-Civilian Clash Says He Can’t Leave Pakistan
headline.print_headline: Journalist Says Pakistan Won’t Allow Him to Leave
